name: Kimi sae Ireba
description:
◆Appearing Characters:



Protagonist(Sutelz Selz) was born on March 1st and is unfriendly and a bit expressionless.
She is a life expert.
Naive.
Can make an effort.
Can never forget someone she once fell in love with until my soul burns out.


Vell Eleu was born on November 23rd.
Loves everything.
Knows about the former star (Earth).
Likes to tease others.


Fred Lincon was born on January 4th and was last seen as a baby...
Has a high degree of intimacy only with those close to him.
Almost expressionless.
A mysterious man.


Banyuu Perkle was born on December 9th and is very self-confident.
Her hobby is training her body; if necessary, she will use force to protect her loved ones.


Henry Ferminius
He thinks deeper than anyone else, and still thinks.

◆History:




This game is both the beginning and the end...


"Even if they're not as prepared or worse than me, that's okay..."
"Even if you don't throw me away, it's okay..."
"Maybe I'm the only one in the world who can throw his life away for someone he cares about..."


This is a story where everything takes place on a new planet with a new specimen called 'Heflite' who has emotional weaknesses but an immense love for her loved ones and others who live around her.


This is a story with a lot going on as it is a Visual Novel Romance where you can 'enter' the story and forget about real life for a few hours full of pleasure for this story and captivating characters!
It is not possible to make changes in the future, but you can make some choices during the game that will NOT affect the course of the story.
The "Replay" resource is not available because it is an unnecessary option for this game, as you can easily go back and continue in the dialogues you have already seen with the mouse scroll. In addition, it is possible to change the sound settings for a pleasant experience for each player, and the main thing is that you can also change the speed of the text and the speed of the automatic text so that there is no need to even put your hand on the keyboard and mouse, thus generating a PERFECT experience for those who just want to relax and make the most of their time while enjoying this moving story.



This story is about a girl named 'Sutelz Selz' who is kidnapped when she can't even think for herself, and she will have to deal with the feelings and difficulties of being someone of the 'Heflite' species...
"Even though I could organize my emotions to some extent, I couldn't stand it..."


[With an immersive and dramatic soundtrack, it portrays the moment and the feelings of the characters.

***The planet and the Hefrids are told of their origins in 'Reset'. ***

◆Cast:


< Production / Character Design / Original Story / Main Visual / Character Design / Music Production / Development ＞
Lucas Vacari Gomes

All content was designed, created and produced by Lucas Vacari Gomes, who wants to show much more about this planet and the new world of origin of the light novel "Reset"!

...This is the story of a Heflite girl who was kidnapped and had to learn about love, trust, relaxation and faith...




[h2}◆Note:[/h2]


* This Game contains scenes of implied sexual content, recommended for Adults; and scenes with words and graphic representations of aggression.

* People who are against this type of content are recommended to abstain.

* In addition to dangerous actions, this game also contains suicidal Dialogues. Take care please.
